plot.label: Cooling Water Pressure
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_hall where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="hall_coolingwater_pressure") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

figure.id: n5 argon pressure and hall temperature
figure.title: N5 Argon, Hall Temperature

plot.label: N5 Argon Pressure [bar]
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_hall where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="n5_argon_pressure") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: Hall Temperature
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_hall where value > -100 and type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="hall_temperature") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: Cooling water temp. hot
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_hall where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="cooling_water_hot") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: Cooling water temp. cold
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_hall where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="cooling_water_cold") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: Thetaprobe Temperature
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_thetaprobe where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="thetaprobe_chiller_temperature") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: XRD Temperature
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_xrd where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="xrd_chiller_temperature") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: Sputterchamber Temperature
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_sputterchamber where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="sputterchamber_chiller_temperature") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: Thetaprobe Pressure
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_thetaprobe where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="thetaprobe_chiller_pressure") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: XRD Pressure
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_xrd where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="xrd_chiller_pressure") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: Sputterchamber Pressure
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_sputterchamber where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="sputterchamber_chiller_pressure") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: Ventilation Pressure
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_hall where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="hall_ventilation_pressure") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: kVA / Ph1
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_ups_b312 where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="b312_ups_kVAPh1") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: kVA / Ph2
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_ups_b312 where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="b312_ups_kVAPh2") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: kVA / Ph3
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_ups_b312 where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="b312_ups_kVAPh3") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot.label: Humidity
plot.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_hall where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="hall_humidity") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}
